text: Ken Kercheval (July 15, 1935 - April 21, 2019) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as Cliff Barnes on the 1980s television series Dallas and its 2012 revival. Kercheval died of pneumonia in Clinton, Indiana on April 21, 2019 at the age of 83. Kercheval is buried at Pisgah cemetery in Helt township, Vermillion county, Indiana. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Indiana Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Indiana
title: Ken Kercheval
